moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather File and Registry Artifacts Enumeration
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will check the file system and registry for particular artifacts. The
        list of artifacts is read from data/post/enum_artifacts_list.txt or a user specified file. Any
        matches are written to the loot.
author: averagesecurityguy <stephen@averagesecurityguy.info>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
